original_text: Then the Lord said to me, ‘Now go down the mountain! The people that you led out of Egypt have done something very bad. They have already refused to obey my commands. They have used gold to make an idol for themselves.’
korean_text: 내게 이르시되 일어나 여기서 속히 내려가라 네가 애굽에서 인도하여 낸 네 백성이 스스로 부패하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 도를 속히 떠나 자기를 위하여 우상을 부어 만들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to me
The people that you led out of Egypt
They have already refused to obey my commands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이미 내 명령에 순종하기를 거부했다

sentences.original_text: They have used gold to make an idol for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 금을 사용하여 자신들을 위한 우상을 만들었다
